source: Podcast – Inspired by Soft Skills Engineering, Developer Tea & The Changelog on Developer Problem-Solving

podcast.name: Soft Skills Engineering, Developer Tea, The Changelog

level_1: Podcasts share real stories of fixing bugs and blockers.
They show how devs tell what went wrong and how they fixed it.
Episodes teach how to break big fixes into small parts.
They explain why sharing lessons helps others too.
This builds clear talk habits for freshers.
level_2: Podcasts show sharing blockers in stand-ups.
They teach giving context when telling a bug story.
Episodes share how to explain failed tries calmly.
They guide telling what tools or tricks worked.
This helps students in team talks and reviews.
level_3: Podcasts share senior devs’ fix stories in teams.
They explain turning mistakes into blogs or talks.
Episodes show how to share stories in peer groups.
They guide sharing fixes with non-tech people too.
level_4: Podcasts explain how seniors mentor juniors on story flow.
They show how to lead group bug talks.
Episodes share solving conflicts with clear facts.
They explain using stories in meetups or talks.
This grows trust and leadership skills.
